  • Packages that use Snapshot 
    Package Description
    ch.cern.dbod.ui.components
    The classes in this package extend the functionality of ZK components in order to provide functionality adapted to the needs of the project.
    ch.cern.dbod.ui.controller
    The controller package is the most important package UI-wise.
    ch.cern.dbod.util
    This package contains the consumer for the SOAP Web Services implemented in the DB On Demand Syscontrol project.
